name: John - the Valentine's day Blind Fighter at Mall
name_original: John - the Valentine's day Blind Fighter at Mall
description:
This is our first game jam ever. We did as much as we could in one week. Hope you enjoy this low-budget, hard, retarded, random, funny game. It is about John trying to buy a gift for his valentine.

Contributors:

https://tcatalin.itch.io/
